text: exotic is a cloud communications
platform we power the business
communications of a lot of companies in
India as well as Southeast Asia
earlier if people had to make calls
right they used to buy wires boxes etc
and pull them together and had to do the
whole bit of managing the exit will
simplify this into simple api's so
companies can just use Exuma api's and
help them communicate with their
customers initial days the whole team
was a bunch of techies were just putting
up and building a solution and then we
started seeing adoption by different SME
startups and slowly enterprises as well
and here we are a 150-plus company
solving one of the most interesting and
complex problems in india and solve this
issue there are two components that we
need to solve that is the scalability
and reliability at the infrastructure
level as well as at the telephony level
while we work on solving the telephony
part we needed a partner who would
ensure reliability and scalability at
the computing part the other reason is
we also are on a growth path where they
are expanding geographically and the
availability of AWS in this regions
makes it easy for us a lot of our use
cases are slightly bursty in nature so
we see some customers having sudden
increase in demand which means we need
to scale accordingly we do around 10
million conversations a day just a year
back we were doing five million
conversations a date which tells us how
fast we have also been growing currently
we use around 47% spot instances and
also we have now spent a little more
time in analyzing a traffic pattern and
reserved a few more instances which
makes the total costs come down a double
ace has a whole bunch of features which
fits in will what we want to do with our
product we use a wider suite of AWS
products from computing to storage to
monitoring - as well as auxillary
products like Bali where we used for our
text to TTS engines which are serviced
really well we run a whole bunch of auto
scalable ec2 instances which scale up
and down based on demand and they use
EBS volumes for a data storage we run a
whole bunch of aerospike and other cache
clusters which helps us
of increased performance of web servers
and telephone servers we are currently
in the face of growth where one of our
greatest factors of growth has been a
geographical footprint our growth in new
regions kinds of two parts one is the
ability to work with operators there and
the ability to have a data center that
and with more data privacy laws in
different countries the need to store
data within the region of regional
operations becomes crucial and the
multiple availability of AWS in these
regions has greatly helped us the
ability to auto scale that AWS provides
using spot instances and reserved
instances has greatly helped us meet
these demands with ease
